PARAMS.TITLE: Java Script Apps
PARAMS.DESCRIPTION: Description : Return the Mode of Ungrouped Data. Example Input : 1,2,3,4,5
PARAMS.BACKGROUND: Background : The mode is the data item that occurs most often in a set of data.

PARAMS.TITLE: Java Script Apps
PARAMS.DESCRIPTION: Description : Return the Mean of Ungrouped Data. Example Input : 1,2,3,4,5
PARAMS.BACKGROUND: Background : The mean is the sum of all entries divided by the number of entries in a data set.

PARAMS.TITLE: Java Script Apps
PARAMS.DESCRIPTION: Description : Return the Median of Ungrouped Data. Example Input : 1,2,3,4,5
PARAMS.BACKGROUND: Background : The Median is the data item which occurs in the middle of a sorted(arranged in ascending order) data set.
